alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 6:29PM CDT until May 02 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN AND EAST CENTRAL SEBASTIAN COUNTIES... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Washburn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Washburn... Fort Chaffee... Burnville... Milltown... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for west central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
